oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Large relic cannonball
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Ordnance that likely was fired from a 24-pounder gun, possibly a Parrott rifled piece or a naval gun. It was found in the yard of a home in Celina, Tennessee. Pro-Confederate Celina and adjoining areas of Clay and Jackson counties were subject to periodic naval bombardments from Union gunboats operating on the Cumberland River.
